name: biab-raspbian
description: Blog In A Box version of Raspbian image builder

scripts.clean: rm ./deploy/*.img ./deploy/*.zip && vagrant ssh -c 'sudo find /home/vagrant/work -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -iname `date +%Y-%m-%d-BlogInABox` ! -iname . -exec rm -r {} \;'
scripts.superclean: npm run clean && vagrant ssh -c 'sudo find /home/vagrant/work -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -iname . -exec rm -r {} \;'
